title: What are some cool gadgets under INR 2500? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5 Some cool gadgets under INR 2500 Here you go: Vintage Wooden Chess Board Game Wine Gift Set with Wine Opener  Wine Opener, Drip Collar, Bottle Stopper and Wine ThermometerIncludes 32 miniature chess pieces, Wine apparatus includes waiter's knife, bottle cap, drop ring & wine thermometer. Dimensions: 17 x 15 x 5cmWine apparatus includes waiter's knife, bottle cap, drop ring & wine thermometerThis stylish box contain a high quality chess set, it also includes a 4-piece wine kit!The stylish set features a flawless chess board and cleverly concealed inside is all 32 playing pieces.Wine accessories set is a perfect gift for every wine connoisseur.Link: Vintage Wooden Chess Board Game Wine Gift Set with Wine Opener, Drip Collar, Bottle Auto Cool Solar Powered Ventilation Exhaust Fan  No batteries neededSolar powered ventilation systemEfficient and power savingPowered By: Solar Energy Fit any car windowKeep your car cool no matter how long it is left in the sunLink: Velkro Auto Cool Solar Powered Ventilation Exhaust Fan Minecraft Redstone Ore  The light on it has 3 levels, but there is not a lot of difference between the 2nd and 3rd levels. I can see a clear difference between the 1st light level and the 2nd one, though. Link: Minecraft Redstone Ore by Think Geek Total Gym Kit Combo 20Kg Home Gym  Weight Plates: 8Weight Of Plates : 20 Kg 4X3 Kg, 4X2Kg, 4 Rods, 1 X 5 Feet , 1 X 3 Feet With Locs, 2 X Dumbbell RodsWith Gloves, Skipping Rope , Hand Griplink: Bodyfit Total Gym Kit Combo 20Kg Home Gym,Set Spy Gear Video Walkie Talkies  Product Groups: Toys & GamesProduct Type: Walkie TalkiesBrand: SpyAmazing walkie talkies!!! The picture quality for a toy is amazing. The range seems to be a couple hundred yards of so. But its enough for my son to have a great time with. They were impossible to find in the store so Amazon to the rescue. They are a little expensive relatively speaking considering its a toy. But they are much better than I expected. Link: Spy Gear Video Walkie Talkies More Resources: Tech Gadgets | Geeky Gadgets Kitchen Gadgets | Geeky Gadgets Hope it helps! Subhasish Adhikary
